basic_info.description: I am a software engineer with experience building website and applications using Javascript, React & Reduct, and Ruby on rails. I am truly passionate about programming. I often found myself spending a lot of time thinking about programming puzzles and different way to solve problems. That was the moment I realized I enjoy programming. I competed course from App Academy, one of the most selective bootcamps. Spending 100+ hrs every week, I sharpened my my programming ability in React and JavaScript. I created an Amazon-like website, a money management website, and a javascript game.
basic_info.description2: When I am not coding, I love going to gym and doing outdoor activities. I also enjoying walking around the street and exploring yummy food.

projects.title: Ama2on
projects.description: Ama2on is e-commence website where buyers can search for products they like. They can check the price and select the affordable one.

projects.title: MoneyBuddy
projects.description: Moneybuddy is a website designed to keep track of users' expenses, and income. The website supports many features to help users to manage money and achieve financial goals.

projects.title: Matching Foods
projects.description: Matching Foods is an elimination game where players must find all the images that can be eliminate.
